main: ^You pull into a gas station looking to refuel while patching up the car and grabing a bite to eat. As the attendant is fueling up the car you notice he looks a bit... green. Perhaps you could use this to your advantage?
^Dine and Dash. What're they gonna do, stop you?

c-0: ^Deciding it's not worth the risk, you simply pay the man and give him a decent tip.
c-2: ^Before the attendant finished his work, you're outta there. You didn't get your snacks, but not a huge loss.
